trans-unit.source: Parsing other strings in .NET
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET 中剖析其他字串

trans-unit.source: Parsing other strings in .NET
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET 中剖析其他字串

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: Parsing other strings in .NET
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET 中剖析其他字串

trans-unit.source: In addition to numeric and [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) strings, you can also parse strings that represent the types [Char](xref:System.Char), [Boolean](xref:System.Boolean), and [Enum](xref:System.Enum) into data types.
trans-unit.target: 除了數值和 [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) 字串，您也可以將表示 [Char](xref:System.Char)、[Boolean](xref:System.Boolean) 和 [Enum](xref:System.Enum) 類型的字串剖析成資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Char
trans-unit.target: Char

trans-unit.source: The static parse method associated with the [Char](xref:System.Char) data type is useful for converting a string that contains a single character into its Unicode value.
trans-unit.target: 與 [Char](xref:System.Char) 資料類型相關聯的靜態 parse 方法，可用於將包含單一字元的字串轉換成其 Unicode 值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example parses a string into a Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將字串剖析成 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Boolean
trans-unit.target: Boolean

trans-unit.source: The [Boolean](xref:System.Boolean) data type contains a [Parse](xref:System.Boolean.Parse(System.String)) method that you can use to convert a string that represents a `Boolean` value into an actual `Boolean` type.
trans-unit.target: [Boolean](xref:System.Boolean) 資料類型包含的 [Parse](xref:System.Boolean.Parse(System.String)) 方法，可用來將代表 `Boolean` 值的字串轉換成實際的 `Boolean` 類型。

trans-unit.source: This method is not case-sensitive and can successfully parse a string containing "True" or "False."
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不區分大小寫，而且可以成功剖析包含 "True" 或 "False" 的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `Parse` method associated with the `Boolean` type can also parse strings that are surrounded by white spaces.
trans-unit.target: 與 `Boolean` 類型相關聯的 `Parse` 方法也可剖析被空白字元包圍的字串。

trans-unit.source: If any other string is passed, a [FormatException](xref:System.FormatException) is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳遞任何其他字串，則會擲回 [FormatException](xref:System.FormatException)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the `Parse` method to convert a string into a `Boolean` value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的程式碼範例會使用 `Parse` 方法將字串轉換成 `Boolean` 值。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration
trans-unit.target: 列舉

trans-unit.source: You can use the static [Parse](xref:System.Enum.Parse(System.Type,System.String)) method to initialize an enumeration type to the value of a string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用靜態的 [Parse](xref:System.Enum.Parse(System.Type,System.String)) 方法初始化字串值的列舉類型。

trans-unit.source: This method accepts the enumeration type you are parsing, the string to parse, and an optional `Boolean` flag indicating whether or not the parse is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法接受您剖析的列舉類型、要剖析的字串，以及指出剖析是否區分大小寫的選擇性 `Boolean` 旗標。

trans-unit.source: The string you are parsing can contain several values separated by commas, which can be preceded or followed by one or more empty spaces (also called white spaces).
trans-unit.target: 您要剖析的字串可以包含數個以逗號分隔的值，前後可有一或多個空格 (也稱為空白字元)。

trans-unit.source: When the string contains multiple values, the value of the returned object is the value of all specified values combined with a bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: 當字串包含多個值時，傳回物件的值就是結合了位元 OR 運算的所有指定值的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `Parse` method to convert a string representation into an enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 下例使用 `Parse` 方法，將字串表示轉換成列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The [DayOfWeek](xref:System.DayOfWeek) enumeration is initialized to Thursday from a string.
trans-unit.target: [DayOfWeek](xref:System.DayOfWeek) 列舉會從字串初始化為星期四。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.target: [在 .NET 中剖析字串](parsing-strings.md)

trans-unit.target: [在 .NET 中格式化類型](formatting-types.md)

trans-unit.target: [在 .NET 中轉換類型](type-conversion.md)
